summary: The tech tag encapsulates articles and profiles focused on the evolving landscape of technology. Highlights include the exploration of decentralized and regenerative design in digital ecosystems as well as profiles of industry leaders specializing in tech and design. The content fosters an interdisciplinary approach, merging philosophy, coding, and user experience to create innovative and sustainable solutions for the future.
excerpt: Fragmentation of the internet mirrors Earth's tectonic shifts and exploitative tech practices. Embracing fragmented systems, 'ecosystem architecture' aims for creating vibrant, sustainable digital ecosystems.
